title: Week 13 Preview, Saints-Cowboys Recap
itunes:title: Week 13 Preview, Saints-Cowboys Recap
description:
In a room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling – react to Dak-time in Jerry World, shushing the Saints on TNF (:30)! After, the heroes preview an impeccable Week 13 NFL schedule, including – will teams that passed on Lamar Jackson eat crow, as the Ravens and ‘Dirty Birds’ of Atlanta take flight (11:00), can the Texans, winners of eight-straight, beat the Offensive Rookie of the Month, Baker Mayfield (29:10), Luck continues to pace the Colts versus the Jags (35:20) and how many points will the Chiefs pour on the Raiders (53:15)? To wrap things up, TB12 tackles the Vikings (1:02:15), can Pittsburgh steal home field advantage by knocking out LAC (1:09:20), and lastly, Washington and Philly try to narrow the NFC East gap on MNF (1:16:20)!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
